articles.title: Moon cave discovered that could one day house humans - BBC.com
articles.description: It is the first cave to be discovered on the Moon and could protect astronauts from radiation.
articles.content:
By Georgina Rannard, Science reporter
Scientists have for the first time discovered a cave on the Moon.
At least 100m deep, it could be an ideal place for humans to build a permanent base, they say… [+3421 chars]
